rows.label: tlk70000022_02_msg0001
rows.name:
That there Blade, Metsu.
He's no ordinary Blade.

rows.label: tlk70000022_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Just thinking about him being out there,
running around left to his own devices...
It fair makes me shiver, it does.

rows.label: tlk70000022_02_msg0003
rows.name:
That's what you get when Blades
don't have a Driver to hold 'em
to some sort of discipline.

rows.label: tlk70000022_02_msg0004
rows.name:
The good old days of peaceful
coexistence are gone, mark my words.
We need to man up and accept it.
